events.message: Customer reported a car accident involving a collision with another vehicle on the highway during rush hour.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under the Auto Accident cluster based on keywords like vehicle and collision.
An agent has been assigned to the case to assist the customer through the claims process efficiently.
We have acknowledged receipt of the claim and assured the customer that we will proceed with the investigation.
The customer was asked to provide photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and insurance details for processing.
Customer submitted all requested documents including accident photos and the police report to support the claim.
Our investigation team has commenced an assessment of the accident details and submitted evidence.
Investigation has been completed and it confirms that the claim is valid with no evidence of fraud.
A preliminary settlement amount has been proposed to the customer for approval based on repair estimates.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed gratitude for the prompt service.
The claim has been officially approved following customer acceptance of the settlement offer.
Payment for the approved claim has been issued and is scheduled to arrive in the customer's account shortly.
The claim file has been closed successfully following payment and confirmation of customer satisfaction.
